info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 3 at 8:40PM CDT until June 4 at 3:19PM CDT by NWS Wichita KS
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas...
Walnut River near El Dorado affecting Butler County.
West Branch Walnut River at El Dorado affecting Butler County.
Walnut River at Augusta affecting Butler and Cowley Counties.
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas...
Walnut River at Winfield affecting Butler and Cowley Counties.
Walnut River at Arkansas City affecting Cowley County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Walnut River near El Dorado.
* WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 22.5 feet, Flood waters from the east bank encroach on the Walnut River Apartments and nearby homes located 1 mile east of El Dorado and north of Highway 54.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don't drown.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 845 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON
